p: EVs facilitate the coagulation process via the exposure of phosphatidylserine, providing a catalytic surface to facilitate the formation of the tenase (factors VIIIa, IXa, and X) and prothrombinase (factors Va, Xa, and II) complexes of the coagulation cascade (100). And EVs initiate clotting by surface expression of tissue factor (TF) under inflammatory conditions (101). Studies have characterized the expression of TF in clinical samples from patients with severe COVID-19, and it was found that the ratio of TF to EV was greater than 15% (101).
